verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
ה֭וֹדוּ <WH3034> O give thanks לֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> unto the God הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of gods כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
ה֭וֹדוּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַאֲדֹנֵ֣י <WH113> to the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <WH113> of lords כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

לְעֹ֘שֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> To him who alone doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> wonders גְּדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> great לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> alone כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
לְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> made הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> the heavens בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה <WH8394> To him that by wisdom כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

לְרֹקַ֣ע <WH7554> To him that stretched out הָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> the earth עַל־ <WH5921> above הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> above the waters כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
לְ֭עֹשֵׂה <WH6213> To him that made אוֹרִ֣ים <WH216> lights גְּדֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> great כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <WH4475> to rule בַּיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> by day כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּרֵ֣חַ <WH3394> The moon וְ֭כוֹכָבִים <WH3556> and stars לְמֶמְשְׁל֣וֹת <WH4475> to rule בַּלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
לְמַכֵּ֣ה <WH5221> To him that smote מִ֭צְרַיִם <WH4714> Egypt בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1060> in their firstborn כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> And brought out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Israel מִתּוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> from among כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> them for his mercy

בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> hand חֲ֭זָקָה <WH2389> With a strong וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> arm נְטוּיָ֑ה <WH5186> and with a stretched out כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

לְגֹזֵ֣ר <WH1504> To him which divided יַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֭וּף <WH5488> the Red לִגְזָרִ֑ים <WH1506> into parts כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

וְהֶעֱבִ֣יר <WH5674> to pass through יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> And made Israel בְּתוֹכ֑וֹ <WH8432> the midst כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> of it for his mercy

וְנִ֘עֵ֤ר <WH5287> But overthrew פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וְחֵיל֣וֹ <WH2428> and his host בְיַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֑וּף <WH5488> in the Red כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
לְמוֹלִ֣יךְ <WH1980> led עַ֭מּוֹ <WH5971> his people בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> through the wilderness כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
לְ֭מַכֵּה <WH5221> To him which smote מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings גְּדֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> great כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <WH2026> And slew מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings אַדִּירִ֑ים <WH117> famous כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
לְ֭סִיחוֹן <WH5511> Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> of the Amorites כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
וּ֭לְעוֹג <WH5747> And Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> of Bashan כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <WH776> their land לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> for an heritage כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
נַ֭חֲלָה <WH5159> [Even] an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> unto Israel עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> his servant כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
שֶׁ֭בְּשִׁפְלֵנוּ <WH8216> us in our low estate זָ֣כַר <WH2142> Who remembered לָ֑נוּ כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
וַיִּפְרְקֵ֥נוּ <WH6561> And hath redeemed מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <WH6862> us from our enemies כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> Who giveth לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> food לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> to all flesh כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
ה֭וֹדוּ <WH3034> O give thanks לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> unto the God הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
